name: OlalaWeb – WooCommerce Category Prices
author: OlalaWeb

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to display your products’ prices on WooCommerce Category Archive pages. Works with Regular price, Sale prices and lowest to highest price. Also includes Schema.org formated micro data.

Prices are saved as metas in WooCommerce term_meta custom table.
sections.installation:
Plugin installation

  1. Download this plugin and add it to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’
  2. Activate it from WordPress » Plugins admin screen

Plugin usage

  1. Create products and give them categories
  2. Go to WooCommerce Settings » Products
  3. Select ‘show subcategory’ instead of ‘show all products’
  4. Have a look at you shop ðŸ˜‰

short_description: Display your products' prices on your WooCommerce Category Archive pages.
description:
This plugin allows you to display your products’ prices on WooCommerce Category Archive pages. Works with Regular price, Sale prices and lowest to highest price. Also includes Schema.org formated micro data.

Prices are saved as metas in WooCommerce term_meta custom table.

screenshots.caption: This screenshot shows how the plugin works. Prices are displayed either as 'Free' (if products have no prices), 'Single price' (if there's only one product or one price) or as 'From To' (if there various products with different prices).
This screenshot shows how to show Categories on WooCommerce Shop main page.
